title: [Large-Scale] Foundational Language Learning Using Interactive Video Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Basic text decoding ability and simple word comprehension
context.additional_context: Interactive language education combining flipped learning and MOOC elements in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners will acquire core vocabulary by responding to at least 80% of quizzes and questions in interactive video lectures.
Learners will enhance communication skills by engaging in two or more verbal interactions with peers on discussion topics within video lectures.
Learners will understand basic grammatical structures with at least 70% achievement in weekly formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
